channel.title: How to fix a pking dupe
channel.description:
i need help with a pking dupe. i believe it has something to do with the deahtimer or the emote. This is how u do the dupe. Person A has the items your going to dupe. Person B has 1item+(like a d scimi or whatever.)
They both tele to magebanks(can take place anywhere in wildy)
Person B attacks Person A until their hp is around 30 or 20. Then they both teleport to assault. Person A attacks a guard and allows the guard to kill them. As soon as Person A dies Person B logs out fast causing Person A to dc which will kick him/her and they will still have their items. Then the items Person A had will appear on the ground. etc.
I would appreciate some help. I rarely do ask unless I have no other options. Thanks and bye.

item.title: How to fix a pking dupe
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

i need help with a pking dupe. i believe it has something to do with the deahtimer or the emote. This is how u do the dupe.

Person B has 1item+(like a d scimi or whatever.)

They both tele to magebanks(can take place anywhere in wildy)

Person B attacks Person A until their hp is around 30 or 20.
Then they both teleport to assault.
Person A attacks a guard and allows the guard to kill them.
As soon as Person A dies Person B logs out fast
causing Person A to dc which will kick him/her
and they will still have their items. Then the items
Person A had will appear on the ground. etc.

I would appreciate some help. I rarely do ask unless I have no
other options. Thanks and bye.
